thread.title: Salman Khan, Kareena Kapoor again at no.1 position in Times Celebex
thread.title_full: Salman Khan, Kareena Kapoor again at no.1 position in Times Celebex - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Salman Khan, Kareena Kapoor again at no.1 position in Times Celebex
text:
Salman Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan, lead pair of Bajrangi Bhaijaan take the top positions in Times Celebex powered by zoom for the month of August 2015.
Salman kept buzzing because of his blockbuster Bajrangi Bhaijaan , his production Hero, news on his next film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo and his two brand endorsements.
Significant gainers in August 2015
Ranbir Kapoor — Leaps from 19th to 6th rank - Buzz around his upcoming film Tamasha
Varun Dhawan — Leaps from 23rd to 8th rank- Due to the buzz around Dilwale and Dhishoom
Shahid Kapoor — Leaps from 27th to 11th rank- For Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa and buzz around his film Shaandaar
Riteish Deshmukh on No. 21 due to the release of his film Bangistan and the buzz around his film Housefull 3
Pulkit Samrat on No. 48 due to the release of his film
Jackky Bhagnani on No. 49 for walking the ramp to support a charity organisation
Others in the list: Sanjay Dutt, Karan Johar, Nana Patekar, Manish Paul, Fawad Khan, Neil Nitin Mukesh and Karan Singh Grover
READ: Kareena Kapoor: I look glamorous when I wear Kajal
Launched in September 2012, Times Celebex is a monthly rating index based on several measurable parameters, including the stars' Box-Office performance, their ability to stay in the news across print, TV and online, their brand endorsement, and their popularity among fans on the internet and social media. These are taken cumulatively to assign the actors a final rank called the 'T Score'. Times Celebex is a scientific and robust ranking system based on data collected from 60+ publications and 250+ TV channels, making it the first ever ranking system for Bollywood. We have put together the stars' ranking for the month of August 2015.
For more interesting Bollywood news and pictures, follow us on Pinterest>>> timesofindia
For latest Bollywood updates, follow us on G+ >>> The Times of India Entertainment
Kareena kept buzzing because of Bajrangi Bhaijaan, news around her upcoming film Udta Punjab and Ki and Ka as well as her five brand endorsements.
Significant gainers in August 2015
Kangana ranautleaps from 17th to 8th rank - Release of her film Katti Batti
Tamannaah Bhatia leaps from 25th to 15th rank- Release of her film Bahubali
Jacqueline fernandez leaps from 29th to 18th rank - Release of her film Brothers
Lara Dutta on No. 29 due to the buzz around Singh Is Bliing
Radhika Apte on No. 32 for the release of Manjhi -The Mountain Man
Lauren Gottlieb on No. 45 for being in the news for Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa
Others in the list: Soha Ali Khan, Taapsee Pannu, Lisa Haydon, Chitrangda Singh, Sushmita Sen and Kalki Koechlin
Reasons for being in the top 10
Shah Rukh Khan: Buzz around his upcoming films Dilwale , Fan , Raees , and his four brand endorsements
Amitabh Bachchan: Buzz around his upcoming film Wazir and one brand endorsement
Saif Ali Khan: Release of Phantom , buzz around his film Rangoon and one brand endorsement
Akshay Kumar: Release of his film Brothers , buzz around his movies Singh Is Bliing and Airlift . Also for his three brand endorsements
Ranbir Kapoor: Buzz around his upcoming film Tamasha and Jagga Jasoos and three brand endorsements
Ranveer Singh: Buzz around his upcoming film Bajirao Mastani
Varun Dhawan: Buzz around his films Dilwale and Dhishoom
Ajay Devgn: Release of Drishyam , buzz around Baadshaho and his directorial venture Shivaay , and one brand endorsement
Sidharth Malhotra: Release of his film Brothers and buzz around his upcoming films Kapoor And Sons and Baar Baar Dekho
